refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A collection of interface utility functions, for loading interfaces and displaying errors.

refsect2.title: totem_interface_error ()
refsect2.para: Display a modal error dialogue with title as its primary error text, and reason as its secondary text.

refsect2.title: totem_interface_error_blocking ()
refsect2.para: Display a modal error dialogue like totem_interface_error() which blocks until the user has dismissed it.

refsect2.title: totem_interface_error_with_link ()
refsect2.programlisting: void totem_interface_error_with_link (const char *title, const char *reason, const char *uri, const char *label, GtkWindow *parent, Totem *totem);
refsect2.para: Display a modal error dialogue like totem_interface_error(), but add a button which will open uri in a browser window.

listitem.simpara: a label for the URI's button, or NULL to use uri as the label
